A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Obviously go see it and make your own decision but I will warn you now. 
Garbage.
Cheesy\, gimmicky\, lack of flow\, too many punch-line moments geared towards... I actually don't know who likes those "toss the saber\, dirt off your shoulder\, Kylo do you have a towel\, chrome dome\, ECT ECT ECT ECT) 
Good space action\, not enough of it. 
Luke's island in it's entirety almost seems like a waste of time. 
Great cast However! Really they are all talented actors/actresses.
It just didn't feel like watching anyone's pure art or self-expression. Just felt like watching a cookie cutter 2017 factory film that's been washed down to try to appeal to
